sys_script_include.description:
Various utiity scripts for timesheets. weekStartHint: Built the annotation for the Time Sheet form. getCurrentTimeSheet: Gets the timesheet for the user, based on the current date. If not found for this week, creates the timesheet. verifyTimeSheet: Submit an object. Will return a TimeSheet object if it can. Returns False otherwise
getCardsForSheet(timeSheet) Returns: Array of TimeCard objects for a specific timesheet. timeSheet: Can take a TimeSheet object, GlideRecord, or Sys_Id.
sys_script_include.name: TimeSheetUtil
